TopicTitle: NASA finds another 5,500 galaxies with Hubble.

Articles.Content:
Found this today I thinks its awesome. I will just let you read the article

http://news.nationalpost.com/2012/09/26/nasas-amazing-hubble-extreme-deep-field-photograph-shows-5500-galaxies-and-took-10-years-to-build/

Now to get there lol.

Hubble Also found the oldest and farthest known galaxy. Link I found with google: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UDFj-39546284

Edited September 27, 2012 by bandit4910
More info in wikipedia link.
Now try to find Waldo in there.

5,500 galaxies.

Each with 100 billion stars.

Most of those stars have a system of planets.

There is life out there, and I await in great anticipation of the day we find it.
